topic.title: Clinical Commissioning Group Eligibility Decision Outcome Communicated to Patient Date (Nhs Continuing Healthcare Standard)
topic.shortdesc: The Clinical Commissioning Group Eligibility Decision Outcome Communicated To Patient Date (NHS Continuing Healthcare Standard) is the date the Clinical Commissioning Group eligibility outcome for NHS Continuing Healthcare (Standard) was communicated in writing to the PATIENT.
